entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
